verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> my prayer, <S%H8605><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Listen <S%H238><s%> to my petitions. <S%H8469><s%> In your faithfulness <S%H530><s%> and righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> relieve me. <S%H6030><s%>
Don't <S%H935><s%> enter into judgment <S%H4941><s%> with your servant, <S%H5650><s%> for in your sight <S%H6440><s%> no man living <S%H2416><s%> is righteous. <S%H6663><s%>

For the enemy <S%H341><s%> pursues <S%H7291><s%> my soul. <S%H5315><s%> He has struck <S%H1792><s%> my life <S%H2416><s%> down <S%H1792><s%> to the ground. <S%H776><s%> He has made me live <S%H3427><s%> in dark <S%H4285><s%> places, <S%H5769><s%> as those who have been long dead. <S%H4191><s%>
Therefore my spirit <S%H7307><s%> is overwhelmed <S%H5848><s%> within me. <S%H3820><s%> My heart within <S%H8432><s%> me is desolate. <S%H8074><s%>

I remember <S%H2142><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of old. <S%H6924><s%> I meditate <S%H1897><s%> on all your doings. <S%H6467><s%> I contemplate <S%H7878><s%> the work <S%H6467><s%> of your hands. <S%H3027><s%>
I spread forth <S%H6566><s%> my hands <S%H3027><s%> to you. <S%H5315><s%> My soul thirsts for you, <S%H5889><s%> like a parched land. <S%H776><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

Hurry <S%H4118><s%> to answer <S%H6030><s%> me, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh. My spirit <S%H7307><s%> fails. <S%H3615><s%> Don't <S%H5641><s%> hide your face <S%H6440><s%> from me, <S%H4911><s%> so that I don't become like those who go down <S%H3381><s%> into the pit. <S%H953><s%>

Cause me to hear <S%H8085><s%> your loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> for I trust <S%H982><s%> in you. <S%H3045><s%> Cause me to know the way <S%H1870><s%> in which <S%H2098><s%> I should walk, <S%H3212><s%> for I lift up <S%H5375><s%> my soul to you. <S%H5315><s%>
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, from my enemies. <S%H341><s%> I flee to you to hide me. <S%H3680><s%>

Teach <S%H3925><s%> me to do <S%H6213><s%> your will, <S%H7522><s%> for you are my God. <S%H430><s%> Your Spirit <S%H7307><s%> is good. <S%H2896><s%> Lead <S%H5148><s%> me in the land <S%H776><s%> of uprightness. <S%H4334><s%>
Revive <S%H2421><s%> me, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, for your name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake. <S%H6666><s%> In your righteousness, bring <S%H3318><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> out of trouble. <S%H6869><s%>

In your loving kindness, <S%H2617><s%> cut off <S%H6789><s%> my enemies, <S%H341><s%> and destroy <S%H6><s%> all those who afflict <S%H6887><s%> my soul, <S%H5315><s%> For I am your servant. <S%H5650><s%>
